title: Loading screen - Black screen and blue boxes
body:
I'm having this constant issue where I get into a game and after champion select, and there is just a black screen and blue boxes then then the game crashes (bugsplat) and the process repeats and I can never get into a game. I'm on a Macbook Pro btw (Yosemite).

Please help

replies.body:
Bumps do not work on the boards.

That might be the result of corrupt files. Have you tried repairing?
